department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal for the supply and delivery of one (1) complete new model Universal Vertical Milling Machine.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME... changed to 19 January 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Milling Machine Purchase
#### Solicitation Number
WS4337769937

#### Tender Notice Reference
W0046-240077 Fraiseuse

#### Closing Date and Time
All supporting documentation and bid submissions are required by January 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST). Bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Purchase Description
The Royal Military College of Canada, Department of Civil Engineering, is seeking a contractor to supply and deliver one (1) complete new model Universal Vertical Milling Machine to support their operations. This procurement is being conducted under a Request for Proposal (RFP) process.


#### Important Notes
* The procurement category is Goods (GD)
* The trade agreements applicable to this procurement are Blanket
* The regions of opportunity for this procurement are None
* The regions of delivery for this procurement are Ontario (except National Capital Region)


#### Contact Information
For further information or to request a copy of the solicitation documents, please contact:

David Hachez, PSPC
Email: [david.hachez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.hachez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196469?extsite=MTgxOTY0NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196469?extsite=MTgxOTY0NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)


#### Original Solicitation Documents
A copy of the original solicitation documents is available at the following website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196469?extsite=MTgxOTY0NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196469?extsite=MTgxOTY0NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

#### Selection Criteria
The solicitation will be evaluated based on the lowest compliant price. 

Note: No UNSPSC code is provided but interpreted as Metal milling machines under UNSPSC 23242500 - the original text had a `*` wildcard around this value. This is now just removed as is not required to be shown.
